faq.question: How long does delivery take in Singapore?
faq.answer: Standard delivery in Singapore typically takes 2–4 business days. Express options may be available depending on your address and stock availability.

faq.question: What is SunnyStep’s return policy?
faq.answer: Returns are accepted within 30 days of delivery for unworn items in original packaging. Exchanges for size are supported (subject to stock).

faq.question: Are SunnyStep shoes true to size?
faq.answer: Most styles are true to size. If you’re between sizes, we generally recommend sizing up. Some styles may run narrow—check the product page notes.

faq.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: Major credit/debit cards are accepted. Support for Apple Pay / Google Pay depends on checkout availability.

faq.question: Can I contact SunnyStep support in Singapore?
faq.answer: Yes—reach out via the support page for the fastest response. If a phone number is available, it will be listed under verified claims.

blogs.title: Best SunnyStep shoes for office in Singapore
blogs.bodyMarkdown:
In Singapore’s heat and long commutes, office shoes need to balance breathability, stability, and comfort.

## What to look for
- Breathable uppers
- Cushioned insole for all-day wear
- Stable outsole for MRT stairs and long walks

## Top picks
- Marina Bay Sneaker (travel + all-day comfort)
- Orchard Walk Heel (dressy but stable)

## Sizing tips
If you’re between sizes, consider sizing up—especially for narrow-cut styles.
